text:
*From The Future is hiring a Content Strategist* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

FTF, a full-service digital agency based in Philly, is seeking an experienced Content Strategist to build and execute SEO-focused content strategies across a wide array of client sites. 

This is a great role for an experienced content marketer who maintains high editorial standards, can streamline production processes and has strong experience in SEO. 

We're open to remote candidates - and offer a competitive salary ($65k $80k annually) as well as comprehensive benefits including unlimited time off and health, dental and vision coverage. 


*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:matt@imfromthefuture.com|matt@imfromthefuture.com>`

*Homeward is hiring a Copywriter* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

Homeward helps people buy houses with cash offers. The company has raised more than $500m and is growing quickly in the fintech space. The company is looking for a copywriter to partner with our Content Strategist to develop creative, clear and compelling content for internal and external clients. 

*Learn more and apply here:* <https://bit.ly/2RgMkWc>

<@U0162CX5SH1>
Happy to answer any questions in this thread or through PM. Thanks for looking everyone :hugging_face:

text:
*Life School is hiring a Lead Researcher* :rocket:

*This is a full-time role.*

*What's the deal?* 

### About Life School

- Life School's mission is to make life better, one new skill at a time.
- We do this by producing short "TLDR-style" guides on life skills (e.g., Cooking, Cleaning, Personal Finance, Home Maintenance, Gardening). Lessons are heavily researched, vetted by industry-leading pros & presented in a standardized, bullet point-based style, ~ 500 words each. Life School audio records all lessons & makes accompanying videos where helpful/necessary. Our work can be found here: [<http://www.trylifeschool.com|www.trylifeschool.com>](<http://www.trylifeschool.com>).
- Our learners are curious, busy, and excited to develop knowledge & skillsets.
- Life School recently raised a pre-seed round from Precursor Ventures, Craft Ventures, Quiet Capital, Jason Tan, and a few angels.

### About the Lead Researcher Role

- Role Description: Researchers are responsible for building lessons & courses. They do this by analyzing & empathizing with the needs of beginner learners, developing compelling syllabi, digging into subjects, problem-solving with category experts, and structuring key takeaways into compelling lessons.
- Skillsets & Qualities: expert analyst, structured problem solver, curious, empathetic for challenges of young adults, interested in DIY & skills-based learning, loves to write
- Desired Background: 2+ years prior work experience, ideally in Journalism or Management Consulting.
- More details about the role: high level IC role with path to management if desired, reports to company founder. Freelance, contract & full time positions are all available. Highly competitive salary & equity compensation. No set hours. Role is remote & highly autonomous.
- To apply: please [email us](<mailto:michelle@trylifeschool.com>) with links to your LinkedIn and two writing samples (<500 words preferred, presentations & memos/emails encouraged). No cover letter necessary.
- Please feel free to share this JD. Thank you for reading to the end! :pray:

*To apply, send an email to:* `<mailto:michelle@trylifeschool.com|michelle@trylifeschool.com>`

attachments.title: Life School
attachments.text: Hacking life, one new skill at a time. Heavily-researched. Expert-approved. TLDR.
